INSTITUTE OF COMMUNICATIONS RESEARCH
THE UNIVERSITY OP ILLINOIS * URBi
1203 West Illinois, Apt. 3
September 28, I96I
Professor Samuel L. Becker
State University of Iowa
Division of Television, Radio, Film
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Sam:
In response to your letter of September 27, concerning
the meeting of the NAEB Research Committee, I will be in Greece
when you meet. Sorry.
Cordially,
Dallas W. Smythe
Research Professor of Communications
S/tb
